name: gittagloader
description: This task will load the first specified tag from the list of tags on the current branch, and store the annotation and label in variables for use in other tasks
author: Entropic Solutions

inputs.name: filter
inputs.label: Tag Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filter used to search for the tag, if nothing or 'latest' is specified, this will grab the most recent tag it can find

inputs.name: lines
inputs.label: Number of Lines
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of lines to grab from the tag

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.label: Variables Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Each variable generated will be prefixed with this value. For example: 'MyPrefix.' results in: #(MyPrefix.Tag.Label)
